features.name: Risk
features.description: Any mentioned risks, dangers, or negative impacts of AI development by the organization.
features.synthesis_topic: The organization's risk assessment (ie what risks does AI development pose)

features.name: Goal
features.description: High-level goals, missions, or objectives (e.g., 'AI alignment' or global AI agreement).
features.synthesis_topic: The goals of the organization (often pretty high-level e.g. 'AI alignment')

features.name: Method
features.description: Strategies, activities, or actions taken to achieve the goals (research, grantmaking, policy work, etc.).
features.synthesis_topic: The methods used by the organization to service their,,, goals

features.name: Primary Method (single choice example)
features.description: Most prominent method or activity mentioned.
features.synthesis_topic: The primary method used by the organization
features.output_categories: policy work, research papers, grantmaking, community building, product development

features.name: Methods (multi choice example)
features.description: All methods or activities mentioned (select all that apply).
features.synthesis_topic: All methods used by the organization
